summary: Saddled with a dull husband and a foolish lover, a woman has an affair with a stranger.
cast: Jeanne Moreau|Jean-Marc Bory|Judith Magre|José Luis de Vilallonga|Gaston Modot|Pierre Frag|Michèle Girardon|Gib Grossac|Lucienne Hamon|Georgette Lobre|Claude Mansard|Alain Cuny|Jean-Claude Brialy|Patricia Maurin
title: Los amantes
